alert.note: Alert for St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 2:53PM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Northwest wind gusts of 35 to 40 mph. Wind gusts decrease to 25 to 30 mph overnight. * WHERE...In Indiana, Lagrange and Noble Counties. In Michigan, St. Joseph MI County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Untreated roadways are expected to become slippery after sunset. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
